mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tSheet (CarNo, date, carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman, chk1) VALUES (#{carNo}, #{date}, #{carSubmit}, #{carSubmitTel}, #{salesman}, #{chk1})
mapper.select: SELECT sheetID, carNo, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, carSubmit, carSubmitTel, salesman, chk1; FROM tSheet WHERE sheetID = #{idx}
